Class BoardCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoardCell
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PropagandaOutlet, Railroad

    public class BoardCell
extends java.lang.Object
    A BoardCell represents any of the cells running along the outside edge of the game board. Since there are different types of cells running along the outside of the board, we use inheritance to create classes derived from BoardCells.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a BoardCell object, with the specified name, image, and coordinates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardCell

        public BoardCell(java.lang.String new_name,
         javax.swing.Icon new_image,
         int x_pos,
         int y_pos,
         java.lang.String edge)
        Creates a BoardCell object, with the specified name, image, and coordinates. Does not have an owner. There are no players standing on this object.
